name: Strip Html Styling and Word Html
description: Group 1<[/]?(span|o:p|font)[^>]*>Removes Beginning and end span, o:p, font tags ONLYGroup 2(class|style)="[^>]*"Removes the class and style attributes from all tagsGroup 3<style>(.*?)</style>Removes style tag and inner contentsGroup 4<!--(.*?)-->Removes html commentsGroup 5 Removes  , alternatively you could replace this group with ( | ) for both charset ISO-8859-1 and UTF-8, respectively.Group 6(width)="([0-9]+)"Removes non-css width attributes from all tags.
author: James Schwietert
